title: 55 raw and graded commons with some Sov & Old Mills $30 each
author: Luke

posts.post_title: 55 raw and graded commons with some Sov & Old Mills $30 each
posts.post_content:
Shipping for any number of cards is $3 (within the U.S.)

Cards range in grade from GD+ to VGEX,  Backs are clean Piedmont and Sweet Cap.  Mostly Piedmont 350.

$30 each (firm)

Thanks for looking.
Removed sold cards and added some Old Mills and Sovereigns.  Please note that the nicest looking Old Mills have a pinhole on the top border.  Bowerman looks VG+ but it laminated.
